short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show you the weather of your current location

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weather Extension is a handy tool that keeps you updated with the current weather conditions of your chosen location. Set your home city in the options and get real-time weather data right in your browser. The extension also offers an auto-overlay feature that can be toggled on or off, allowing you to view weather data on any website you visit. Stay informed about the weather without having to leave your browser or open a new tab.
